Process

Measure twice. Cut once.

At Otter we believe "less is more" in software development. We carefully analyze a problem before writing any lines of code to ensure we are always building towards business goals in the simpliest way possible.

We practice Agile software development centered around the idea of fast iterative development and frequent updates and collaboration between engineers and Product Managers. This allows teams to build faster, with greater quality, and be more responsive to adversity and change.

Integrations

Redeeem integrates nicely with other crypto services, platforms and exchanges.

We integrate with APIs of many popular tech services to ensure sure your experience on Redeeem is fast, safe and easy. For a list of other recommended software partners, go to our Partners page.

Civic

Civic provides fast identity verification in over 200 countries and territories.

CoinPayments

Buy Redeeem Credits with dozens of cryptocurrencies on CoinPayments.

Bcoin

Own your own security keys through the Redeeem Wallet, hosted by Bcoin.

CoinDesk

Configure buyer and seller alerts to get real-time market alerts on your mobile device.

WhatsApp

Receive gift card order and transfer updates right in WhatsApp.

Loom

Video record your redemption activity using Loom to protect against fraud.

Twilio

Receive gift card price updates by retail brand via SMS, provided by Twilio.

Paxful

Compare prices on Paxful to make sure you're getting the best rate.

Stabecoins

Buy Credits with stabecoins from Tether, TrueUSD, Coinbase and Binance.
